definition[0]: land or soil that is barren has no plants growing on it
example[0]: Thousands of years ago the surface was barren desert.
definition[1]: unable to produce children or baby animals – used of a woman or of female animals
definition[2]: a tree or plant that is barren does not produce fruit or seeds
definition[3]: used to describe something that does not look interesting or attractive
example[1]: The sports hall was a rather barren concrete building.
definition[4]: used to describe a period of time during which you do not achieve anything or get any useful results
example[2]: I scored five in the first seven games, but I’ve had a bit of a barren patch since then.
